resources.string:
Hi, I'm Susritha.

I'm a beginner to android development and started a course offered by udacity. 
I'm trying to code everything that is taught to get hands on practice and experience. 
Developing an application seems fun like never before. 

I only had experience in web development but now I stepped into android development too. 

Let's see how deep the course is and how well I can grab things 

Happy learning :)!!
